personal.name: Fofie Jounewe Joel Freude
personal.bio: Passionate web designer and software developer with 5 years of experience in web design and 3 years in front-end development. Specialized in creating innovative digital solutions and maintaining IT infrastructure.

projects.title: Food Delivery App
projects.description: A comprehensive food delivery web interface built with React and Next.js, featuring real-time ordering, payment integration, and responsive design.

projects.title: Online Library Website

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: An ongoing e-commerce mobile application with advanced tracking features in the admin dashboard, built using Flutter for cross-platform compatibility.
